message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40. What do you say?
My turn. This time, I'll take 70 and you get 30.  Think carefully, the money loses value with each round!
Okay, let's try this. I'll take 65, and you get 35. This is a fair compromise, and we can both get something.  We don't want to keep losing money to inflation, right?
